messages.content:
```l0002
let add2 = <x y: add x y>..

let result = add2 4 5..

print result..
```

```l0002
| Define a function to convert a number to a FizzBuzz string
let fizzbuzz = <n:
  if eq (mod n 15) 0 then
    "FizzBuzz" 
  else if eq (mod n 3) 0 then
    "Fizz"
  else if eq (mod n 5) 0 then 
    "Buzz"
  else
    concat "" n
>..

| Generate a list of numbers from 1 to 100
let numbers = range 1 100 1..

| Convert each number to its FizzBuzz string 
let result = map (fizzbuzz) numbers..

| Print out the FizzBuzz sequence
print (concat ", " result)..
```

code:
| Define a function to convert a number to a FizzBuzz string
let fizzbuzz = <n:
  if eq (mod n 15) 0 then
    "FizzBuzz" 
  else if eq (mod n 3) 0 then
    "Fizz"
  else if eq (mod n 5) 0 then 
    "Buzz"
  else
    n
>..

| Generate a list of numbers from 1 to 100
let numbers = range 1 100 1..

| Convert each number to its FizzBuzz string 
let result = map (fizzbuzz) numbers..

| Print out the FizzBuzz sequence
print result
..
explanation: L0002 program that transforms each element in a collection.
